directions: Combine all of the ingredients in a small bowl and serve within 2 to 3 hours. (For the freshest taste, serve this sauce within 1 hour.)
ingredients: 1/4 cup finely diced scallions (white part only)
1 ripe plum tomato, seeded and cut into 1/8-inch dice
1 teaspoon minced red or green jalapeño chili, seeds removed according to desired hotness
title: Spiced Chili Sauce
